newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Paranagua/Santos sugar shipping conditions.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Paranagua/Santos sugar shipping conditions.

text.p: The Brazilian port of Paranagua reported the following conditions for shipping sugar.
Vessels: Prometheus loading 14,000 tonnes using big bags, Europegasus loading 25,000 tonnes using big bags Waiting to dock: eight vessels to load using big bags, one to load bulk
Road: 274 trucks carrying sugar arrived on May 22. Total for May so far 2,252 trucks
Waiting to dock: Unisea to load 14,000 tonnes bagged sugar, Daiana P to load 14,000 tonnes bagged sugar
Stocks: 26,000 tonnes bulk in CODESP warehouses, no bagged sugar. Private warehouses already with bagged sugar but stock levels unavailable
